question: Good Morning My name is Ann and yes it shows that I am a registered nurse, but my speciality is not diabetes. A child at my church has just been diagnosed her blood sugar when she arrived at ER was 800 - 1100. I was asking he mom what she could eat and she said oh anything I just cover her with enough insulin and she is fine. I need to know of anything I can copy or educate myself on so I can help them. Thanks a bunch,Ann
title: New onset 5 year old diabetes
